entry.title: Russia Moves to Legalize Crypto Use for International Payments—Here’s Why
entry.summary:
According to the latest reports, Russia is now accelerating its regulatory efforts on crypto usage—a move that comes amidst increasing international sanctions, which are impacting business operations and financial transactions. This comes as Bloomberg reported earlier today that the Russian government is working on legislation that could make digital currencies a vital component in circumventing these financial barriers, highlighting a significant policy shift from earlier restrictions.
Details of The Crypto Legailzation
The State Duma, Russia’s lower house of parliament, is scheduled to process the crypto bills in its upcoming sessions. These include both the general regulation of digital currencies and specific measures concerning crypto mining. Furthermore, the draft laws, expected …

entry.title: Bitcoin Finds Major Relief After 10 Years: Is The US Government Now The Biggest Threat?
entry.summary:
Bitcoin is shaky at spot rates, looking at the formation in the daily chart. The leg-up to spot rates meant the world’s most valuable coin shot by roughly 30%, rising from the pits of $53,500 to around $70,000 over the weekend.
Mt. Gox Overhang Gone, A Relief For Bitcoin
As prices cool off, rapidly finding rejection from the critical round number and roughly $2,000 from June 2024 highs, Glassnode analysts think Bitcoin is entering a new era. Citing the recent distribution of BTC by Mt. Gox creditors, Glassnode observed that the “overhang” that had held the industry ransom for roughly 10 years is easing.
After initial fears that the distribution of billions of BTC by Mt. Gox creditors would wreak the market were proven otherwise, prices rose. While there was success as the market sh…

entry.title: Kamala Harris Crypto Stance Questioned As She Mulls Anti-Crypto VP Choice
entry.summary:
In the aftermath of rumors that she is attempting to patch up her ties with the cryptocurrency community, the Vice President of the United States, Kamala Harris, has taken actions that appear to be in direct opposition to the objectives that she has articulated for herself.
Kamala Harris is contemplating on endorsing Michigan lawmaker Gary Peters for the 2024 elections. Bitcoin enthusiasts have been deeply concerned about this latest development.
Peters vehemently opposes bitcoin since he has endorsed the Money Laundering Act of 2023, which specifically targets the illicit use of cryptocurrency for financing terrorist activities.
Sen. Gary Peters, D-Mich., is being pushed by organized labor to be considered as Vice President Kamala Harris’ running mate, Axios reported. https://t.…

entry.title: Crypto Analyst Uses Historical Data To Predict When Bitcoin Price Will Reach $200,000
entry.summary:
The Bitcoin price has been expected to hit the 6-figure mark for a couple of years now, but this target continues to be elusive for the cryptocurrency. However, with a crypto bull run predicted by experts to be around the corner, the expectations for a 6-figure Bitcoin price have emerged once again. One crypto analyst in particular has taken it a step further, predicting when the Bitcoin price will hit $200,000 based off of historical data.
Bitcoin Power Law And Exponential Decay Theory
In an X (formerly Twitter) post, pseudonymous crypto analyst @apsk32 pointed out a 13-year trend that has held true for Bitcoin since its inception. This trend uses a power law equation and an exponential decay to help pinpoint how high the Bitcoin price will go in each cycle and how low it could possib…

He highlighted bitcoin’s role in revolutionizing the global economy, advocating for its adoption as a primary treasury asset to ensure economic […]

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Flowing Into US Platforms: Here’s What Happened Last Time
entry.summary:
Data shows the American exchanges are observing a rise in their Bitcoin dominance. Here’s what happened the last two times this trend appeared.
Bitcoin Is Moving From Global Platforms To US-Based Ones
In a new post on X, CryptoQuant founder and CEO Ki Young Ju has discussed a trend that has been emerging in a Bitcoin indicator recently. The metric in question is the ratio between the BTC reserve of US-based platforms and off-shore ones.
“Platforms” here not only include the exchanges, but also the spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs), which were only approved to operate in the US in January of this year.
When the value of this ratio goes up, it means the US-based platforms are seeing their reserve go up relative to the off-shore ones. Such a trend could suggest interest is shifting …

entry.title: Crypto Red Carpet Moment: CEO Declares ‘Mainstream’ Arrival
entry.summary:
In a recent interview with CNBC ‘Money Movers’ host Mark Quintanilla, WisdomTree CEO Jonathan Steinberg announced that crypto is going and will continue to be mainstream in the coming years. This sentiment is further strengthened by the recent speech by former US President Donald Trump in a recent Bitcoin conference that saw huge potential for investors.
The Key To Open The Mainstream Door
According to Steinberg, the former President’s ambitiousness on the crypto side makes it all the more enchanting to retail investors. Trump’s promises of regulatory clarity for Bitcoin and crypto as an asset class is a big deal for the crypto market which has since been bombarded by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) with regulatory action.

ETHFI Season 2 claims available this week. Base hits record 1m UserOps in a week.

entry.title: Zoltan Istvan on AI and Human Immortality
entry.summary: Transhumanist Party founder Zoltan Istvan chats with Decrypt's Emerging Technology report Jason Nelson about his journey with transhumanism, running for office, and why he fears AI is outpacing life science and poses a threat to the quest for immortality.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 157 - ROLLBIT FRIDAY!
entry.summary: The German state sells $2bn+ BTC and has under $300m left. BTC ETF sees $800M of inflows, Mr 100 keeps buying. SOL ETF deadline set for 2025, election could be key. SOL stablecoin TVL soars on Tether & PYUSD growth. Firedancer sees the first accepted block on SOL testnet. ETH ETFs finally expected next week. Monthly active crypto addresses top 100m. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville conference. Golman Sachs to launch 3 tokenization projects. Short squeeze in altcoins sees TIA rise 80% from lows. MOG leads top memes coins, BONK flips WIF. Farming interest shifts to Berachain & Monad.

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 156 - ETH ON THE RISE!
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$147m. ETH outperforms with ETF optimism. Germany government moves 2375 BTC again. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Trump to speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Goldman Sachs to launch 3 tokenisation projects. Realised losses similar to COVID period. Staked ETH nears ATH. CEX stablecoin volume hits 7-month low. CFTC says 70-80% of crypto not securities. Base hardfork improves compression 20-30%. BitMEX pleads guilty to AML violation. APTOS & SEI see weak attendance at ETHcc event.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 155 - ETFs SAVE THE DAY
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: $216m. $654m of inflows into ETFs over 3 days. BTC transaction fees hit 4-year low. German state moves $300m BTC, holdings $1bn. SOL flips ETH for 7d DEX volumes. SOL Firedancer sees first accepted block on testnet. Tether mints another $250m USDT on SOL. Crypto monthly active addresses tops 100m. Biden crypto veto now expected to be upheld. Tech coalition urges Biden to back crypto. People face security threats at ETHCC. DBS sees 300% growth in crypto trading. PYUSD now 7th largest stable coin. China may have already sold BTC holdings. Elliptic exposes $11bn USDT scam network. StanChart in talks to buy Howard’s crypto fund. Polychain accuses former employee of side deals. SEI leads altcoins as it launches v2 mainnet beta. TIA rises 80% from lows on short squeeze. TON to release L2 based on Polygon’s tech stack.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 154 - THE CELEBS ARE BACK...
entry.summary: BTC ETF Flows: +$295m. ETF inflows fight German selling, BTC unchanged. German government sells $900m BTC, moves more. Rate of sales implies German supply sold this week. ETH ETFs set to launch next week. Election may affect SOL ETF decision March 2025. Raydium beats ETH for 24hr fees. BTC ‘power law’ points to 300% gain by 2025. BTC in 80 day post-halving re-accumulation phase. BlackRock treasury fund hits $500m. Republicans release pro-crypto policy. Senate urges blockchain tests for national security. Drop in BTC mining difficulty ‘comparable to FTX’. MetaMask introduces delegation toolkit. 25 major projects to launch tokens in H2 2025.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 153 - A WEAK WEEKEND
entry.summary: BTC sinks 5% then bounces back to unchanged. $58-60k the main area for ‘shorts to defend’. Crypto funds saw $441m inflows last week. German government transfers 1000 BTC to sell. Crypto sentiment at lowest in over a year. ETH spot premium hits local highs. Japanese firm Metaplanet buys $2.5m BTC. Expect more miners merging: TeraWulf CEO. SOL Firedancer bug bounty goes live. GLM transfers $117m of ETH treasury to exchanges. 98% of coins have topped this cycle: Kang. ETH ETF should come in next 2 weeks: Geraci. Crypto progress disheartening: Copeland.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 152 - JOINED BY DEEZE!
entry.summary: BTC hits $54k, set for worst week in over year. Mt. Gox begins to move BTC & make distributions. German government continues to sell holdings. Worst day for BTC liquidations since FTX. Justin Sun says he is willing to buy German BTC. German MP calls on it to stop selling BTC. $52k super-trend support line eyed for BTC. Funding rates turn extremely negative across majors. Only 6 mining machines profitable below $56k. Coinbase spot buyers emerge to counter drop. Total3 hits RSI lows only hit 4 times in last 4 years. Fear & Greed index hits lowest since Jan 2023. Capo remains bullish. Real selling begins at $38k: Schiff. Coinbase continue to fight for Gensler’s emails. Circle mints $250m USDC on SOL. Symbiotic hits $1bn TVL. Taiwan Mobile may open crypto exchange. Unisat completes funding round with Binance.
